item.title: Mindi add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Hemingway, Ernest
item.description: "I drink to make other people more interesting." -- Hemingway, Ernest

item.title: Mindi add a quote by John Russell
item.description: "Sanity calms, but madness is more interesting." -- John Russell

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "If you obey all of the rules, you miss all of the fun." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "It's not worth doing something unless someone, somewhere, would much rather you weren't doing it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "It's strange because sometimes, I read a book, and I think I am the people in the book." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Mindi add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "The most wasted of all days is one without laughter." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Mindi add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Don't tell me the moon is shining; show me the glint of light on broken glass." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "If you are afraid of loneliness, don't marry." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "‎Life is a shipwreck, but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats." -- Voltaire

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Voltaire
item.description:
"I have never made but one prayer to God, a very short one: Oh Lord, make my enemies ridiculous. And God granted it."
(<i>Letter to Étienne Noël Damilaville</i>, May 16, 1767)" -- Voltaire

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "I don’t know where I am going, but I am on my way." -- Voltaire

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Freddie Mercury
item.description: "Oh, I was not made for heaven. No, I don't want to go to heaven. Hell is much better. Think of all the interesting people you're going to meet down there!" -- Freddie Mercury

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Jonathan Franzen
item.description: "Nice people don't necessarily fall in love with nice people." -- Jonathan Franzen

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Suzanne Finnamore
item.description: "I was steeped in denial, but my body knew." -- Suzanne Finnamore

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Suzanne Finnamore
item.description: "I used to loathe ambivalence; now I adore it. Ambivalence is my new best friend." -- Suzanne Finnamore

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "I wish friends held hands more often, like the children I see on the streets sometimes. I'm not sure why we have to grow up and get embarrassed about it." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Roberto Hogue
item.description: "Real sex is as much about reciprocity as it is exploration and if you need a reason to resent a man later on, just consider the guy who doesn’t believe in cunnilingus..." -- Roberto Hogue

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Candace Bushnell
item.description: "Maybe our girlfriends are our soulmates and guys are just people to have fun with." -- Candace Bushnell

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "‎"she’ mad but she’ magic. there’ no lie in her fire." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mindi add a quote by Dan Pearce
item.description: "It doesn’t matter if I’m off the beat. It doesn’t matter if I’m snapping to the rhythm. It doesn’t matter if I look like a complete goon when I dance. It is my dance. It is my moment. It is mine. And dance I will. Try and stop me. You’ll probably get kicked in the face." -- Dan Pearce
